title: New Sidi MTB Turbo performance mountain bike shoes strike balance between XC & Enduro
content:
Sidi has a new pair of MTB Turbo mountain bike shoes that strike an all-mountain, trail riding balance between full-on cross-country or gravity racing. The bulk of the high-performance shoes Sidi is most known for focus almost entirely on pedaling efficiency, but these new Turbos for more walkability to cover more varied terrain, and a

The post New Sidi MTB Turbo performance mountain bike shoes strike balance between XC & Enduro appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
